K12D0365_H0375:240a-3: dbang gi rab tu byed pa /
K12D0365_H0375:240a-4: thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0365_H0375:240a-5: phab pa btang ba'i phyi nas mgo bo dang ni
K12D0365_H0375:240a-6: snying ga spyi gtsug rnams dang lte ba mgrin pa
K12D0365_H0375:240a-7: dang // gsang ba rnams su srung ba rgyal ba
K12D0365_H0375:240a-8: rnams kyis rang gi rigs gyur rnams la rang gi
K12D0365_H0375:240a-9: dang // rdor gsum gyis // slob ma rnams kyi
K12D0365_H0375:240a-10: lus la gos ser bskon zhing mig rnams bkab nas
K12D0365_H0375:240a-12: kun rdzob don du rab mchog lam nas gshegs nyid
K12D0365_H0375:240a-13: rnams la brtul zhugs rnams ni sbyin bya rtag pa
K12D0365_H0375:240b-0: ru // gsad dang mi bden pa @240b dang gzhan
K12D0365_H0375:240b-1: gyi bud med rnams spangs de bzhin gzhan nor chang
K12D0365_H0375:240b-3: 'khor ba'i rdo rje zhags pa rang gi dge ba
K12D0365_H0375:240b-4: 'joms par byed pa sdig pa lnga po 'di nyid
K12D0365_H0375:240b-5: rnams // gang zhig gang gi dus su byung ba'i
K12D0365_H0375:240b-6: lha dang mi yi bla ma de yi ming gis
K12D0365_H0375:240b-8: sna tshogs gtso bo'i bka' stsal 'di yis srid pa'i
K12D0365_H0375:240b-9: 'jigs pa 'joms pas khyod rnams kyis kyang bskyang bar
K12D0365_H0375:240b-10: gyis / rgyan 'gyed kha na ma tho bcas pa'i
K12D0365_H0375:240b-11: zas dang tshig ngan klog dang 'byung po lha min
K12D0365_H0375:240b-12: gyis / chos rnams dang // ba lang byis pa
K12D0365_H0375:240b-13: bud med skyes pa rnams dang lha dang mi rnams
K12D0365_H0375:240b-14: bla ma lnga ni gsad mi bya /
K12D0365_H0375:240b-15: grogs dang rje bo dang ni lha mi'i bla ma dge 'dun dbugs 'byin rnams la 'khu ba dang //
K12D0365_H0375:240b-16: dbang po rnams kyis yongs su chags rnams min te
K12D0365_H0375:240b-17: srid pa'i bdag po'i brtul zhugs nyi shu rtsa lnga'o;
K12D0365_H0375:240b-18: ;dpal ldan sngags kyis mngon par bsngags pa lag pa'i
K12D0365_H0375:240b-19: padma kha sbyar du ni me tog gcig byin te
K12D0365_H0375:240b-20: // dbang po lan gsum bskor te lag pa'i padma
K12D0365_H0375:240b-21: kha sbyar gnas pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor du ni
K12D0365_H0375:240b-22: // ngor // gnas gyur gang du me tog bzang
K12D0365_H0375:240b-23: po lhung ba de nyid de yi rigs su des
K12D0365_H0375:240b-25: phyi nas dbang bdun rnams dang rnam gsum 'dir ni
K12D0365_H0375:240b-26: ji lta ba bzhin bla med yang dag rab tu
K12D0365_H0375:240b-27: sbyin // klu rnams kyis sa ma bzhis te rgyal
K12D0365_H0375:240b-28: ba rnam rgyal bcas pa'i bum pa nor bu gser
K12D0365_H0375:241a-0: sbyin // gyi bum pa'am // sa las byung ba rnams su @241a *//
K12D0365_H0375:241a-1: rin chen sman ldan dang ni dri ldan rnams kyis lha mo rnams kyis khrus bya'o //
K12D0365_H0375:241a-2: sangs rgyas rab dbye rnams kyis dbu rgyan sbyin te
K12D0365_H0375:241a-3: mchog gi bla mas nus ma rnams kyis dar dpyangs
K12D0365_H0375:241a-4: nyid // rdo rje dril bus nyi ma zla ba
K12D0365_H0375:241a-5: nyid de brtul zhugs kyis kyang yul dang dbang po
K12D0365_H0375:241a-6: nyid // sbyang bar bya // ming gis khro bo
K12D0365_H0375:241a-7: rnams dang byams sogs dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i
K12D0365_H0375:241a-8: rjes gnang phyi mor bcas pa sbyin //
K12D0365_H0375:241a-9: rdo rje dang ni dril bu rab tu sbyin nas
K12D0365_H0375:241a-10: mchog gi snying rjes dag pa'i chos rnams bstan par
K12D0365_H0375:241a-11: bya // rdo rje'i rigs su nges pa srog gcod
K12D0365_H0375:241a-12: pa dang ral grir mi bden pa yi ngag brjod
K12D0365_H0375:241a-13: bya // bya ba dang // rin chen du ni
K12D0365_H0375:241a-14: gzhan nor 'phrog dang mchog gi padma'i rigs nyid du
K12D0365_H0375:241a-16: 'khor lor 'chang dang mar me sangs rgyas rnams dang
K12D0365_H0375:241a-17: yul rnams mtha' dag shin tu bsten par bya ba'o
K12D0365_H0375:241a-18: // gri gug tu ni gdol pa mo la sogs
K12D0365_H0375:241a-19: pa bud med mtha' dag mkha' yi padma smad mi
K12D0365_H0375:241a-20: // bya // sems can rnams kyi don du nor
K12D0365_H0375:241a-21: dang lus bcas sbyin gyi 'di ni khyod kyis bsrung
K12D0365_H0375:241a-23: rigs kyi bu rnams gzhan du bskal ba grangs med
K12D0365_H0375:241a-24: pas kyang sangs rgyas min par rgyal bas gsungs par
K12D0365_H0375:241a-25: nges // chu yis sgrol ma la sogs lha mo
K12D0365_H0375:241a-26: rnams dang dbu rgyan rgyal ba rnams te dar dbyangs
K12D0365_H0375:241a-27: nges // nus ma rnams // rdo rje dril bus
K12D0365_H0375:241a-28: nyi zla dag dang brtul zhugs yul sogs rnams dang
K12D0365_H0375:241b-0: ming gis @241b byams pa sogs su sbyong //
K12D0365_H0375:241b-1: rjes gnang rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpal ldan srid pa'i
K12D0365_H0375:241b-2: 'jigs pa 'joms pa dus kyi 'khor lo rjes khyab
K12D0365_H0375:241b-3: pa // de ltar dbang bdun rnams kyis sdig pa'i
K12D0365_H0375:241b-4: dri ma 'joms pas dkyil 'khor nyid du yang dag
K12D0365_H0375:241b-5: pa // rab tu sbyin // dbang bdun rnams kyis
K12D0365_H0375:241b-6: dbang rnams bkur na dge ba'i dbang gis sa bdun
K12D0365_H0375:241b-8: phyis ni phyir mi ldog la sogs pa nges par
K12D0365_H0375:241b-9: rab tu 'jug pa bum pa dang ni gsang ba'i
K12D0365_H0375:241b-10: dbang // shes rab ye shes dbang rnams bskur bas
K12D0365_H0375:241b-11: srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i 'jam dbyangs nyid du
K12D0365_H0375:241b-12: dbang // 'gyur ba'o // 'gro ba g-yo sgyu'i dbang
K12D0365_H0375:241b-13: gis rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na 'di nyid la
K12D0365_H0375:241b-15: rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dbang bdun la gnas
K12D0365_H0375:241b-16: yon tan can gyis bzlas pas rnam par dag par
K12D0365_H0375:241b-17: 'gyur // gal te bum pa dang ni gsang bar
K12D0365_H0375:241b-18: brtul zhugs nges pa'i dbang ste gong mar dag pa
K12D0365_H0375:241b-19: 'gyur // yod ma yin // gang zhig la ni
K12D0365_H0375:241b-20: rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dag par bya ba'i
K12D0365_H0375:241b-22: rjes gnang thob nas phyi nas tshogs kyi rigs su
K12D0365_H0375:241b-23: 'gro na rgan pa zhes pa las ni gzhon pa'o
K12D0365_H0375:241b-24: // rtsa ba'i ltung ba bu rnams kyis te dpal
K12D0365_H0375:241b-25: ldan bla ma'i thugs sun phyung ba ri bong 'dzin
K12D0365_H0375:241b-26: // par 'gyur // de yi bka' las 'das pa
K12D0365_H0375:241b-27: gzhan te de bzhin du ni spun la khro ba
K12D0365_H0375:242a-0: byams pa spangs pa bzhi par 'gyur te @242a *//
K12D0365_H0375:242a-1: gzhan yang byang chub sems nyid rab tu spangs pa las ni mda'//
K12D0365_H0375:242a-2: grub mtha' smod pa drug pa nyid de gzhan yang
K12D0365_H0375:242a-3: ma smin skye bo rnams la gsang ba byin pa
K12D0365_H0375:242a-4: ri // phung po nyon mongs pa las klu ru
K12D0365_H0375:242a-5: 'gyur te gzhan yang dag pa'i chos la ma dad
K12D0365_H0375:242a-6: ri // dgu pa'o // sgyu yi byams pa phyogs
K12D0365_H0375:242a-7: te ming sogs bral ba'i bde ba ster la rtog
K12D0365_H0375:242a-9: dag pa'i sems can rnams la rab tu skyon brjod
K12D0365_H0375:242a-10: nyi mar 'gyur ro dam tshig rnyed pa spangs na
K12D0365_H0375:242a-11: gzhan // bud med thams cad la smod nges par
K12D0365_H0375:242a-12: ma nur 'gyur te rdo rje theg pa la gnas
K12D0365_H0375:242a-13: gzhan // rnams kyi'o // phyogs kyi lo ni gcig
K12D0365_H0375:242a-14: nas rnam pa bcu yi bar du lta dang reg
K12D0365_H0375:242a-15: par bya ba yin pa ste //
K12D0365_H0375:242a-16: de nas 'khyud bya rnams ni rgya mtsho rnams dang
K12D0365_H0375:242a-17: ro bcas bsten par bya ba g-yo ba la sogs
K12D0365_H0375:242a-18: pa // nyi shu'i lo yi 'og ma'i phyag rgya
K12D0365_H0375:242a-19: rnams ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo 'byung bo
K12D0365_H0375:242a-20: pa // lha min rigs // dbang gi don du
K12D0365_H0375:242a-21: drug dang gsum gyis bde mnyam 'bras ster ba dang
K12D0365_H0375:242a-22: gzhan ni bsgom pa'i don du'o //
K12D0365_H0375:242a-23: gang zhig dang por yang ni dpal ldan shes rab
K12D0365_H0375:242a-24: nu mar reg pa de nyid bum pa'i dbang du
K12D0365_H0375:242a-25: brjod // ri bong 'dzin pa myangs dang gsang ba
K12D0365_H0375:242a-26: mthong bar byas pas gsang ba'i dbang du rab tu
K12D0365_H0375:242a-27: brjod // 'gyur ba'o // mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs
K12D0365_H0375:242a-28: kyis yan lag kha rnams sbyang bar bya ste shes
K12D0365_H0375:242a-29: rab ye shes dbang sbyin bya //
K12D0365_H0375:242b-0: rgyal ba dbang por @242b byas te slob ma'i don
K12D0365_H0375:242b-1: du phyag rgya sbyin dang gzhan yang bla ma la
K12D0365_H0375:242b-2: yang 'dir // rgyan rnams thams cad ldan pa'i gser
K12D0365_H0375:242b-3: zhun dang ni mtshungs pa'i lo nyid bcu gnyis ma
K12D0365_H0375:242b-5: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid ldan pas rang gi
K12D0365_H0375:242b-6: rdo rje nor bus spyad bya nyid ni chags bcas
K12D0365_H0375:242b-7: la // slob ma dag pa shes nas rdo rje
K12D0365_H0375:242b-8: sa bon bcas pa khar ni yang dag gzhug par
K12D0365_H0375:242b-9: la // bya ba nyid // phyis ni rang gi
K12D0365_H0375:242b-10: phyag rgya bu la byin par byas nas de nas
K12D0365_H0375:242b-11: gzhan yang du ba'i lam la sogs ldan yang //
K12D0365_H0375:242b-12: skrag dang 'khrul pa'i sems dang g-yo dang gzhan gyi
K12D0365_H0375:242b-13: dbang du 'gro ba dang ni nad ldan bu btsas
K12D0365_H0375:242b-14: dang // khro ldan khengs shing 'dod la chags dang
K12D0365_H0375:242b-15: rdzun dang rtsod pa la dga' yan lag nyams dang
K12D0365_H0375:242b-16: dang // ma dag pa // de lta bu rnams
K12D0365_H0375:242b-17: shes rab ye shes dbang du shin tu 'bad de
K12D0365_H0375:242b-18: bla mas spang bya mi'i dpang po //
K12D0365_H0375:242b-19: sngar gsungs sangs rgyas bla ma dag la gus ldan
K12D0365_H0375:242b-20: dam tshig 'dzin la phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod par
K12D0365_H0375:242b-21: bya // 'gro ba rnams kyi rang gi yid nyid
K12D0365_H0375:242b-22: 'dod chags kyis ni 'khrugs par byed dang gang bar
K12D0365_H0375:242b-23: bya // 'gyur ba nyid // yan lag mchog la
K12D0365_H0375:242b-24: gang ba las ni 'bar bas ri bong 'dzin pa
K12D0365_H0375:242b-25: zhu nas yang dag 'dzag pa nyid //
K12D0365_H0375:242b-26: aodda dgug par rab tu byas pas mchog gi bde
K12D0365_H0375:242b-27: ba ster ba thig le thar pa gsum gyi mthar
K12D0365_H0375:242b-28: // snang reg 'dus dang 'gyur dang bde ba rnams
K12D0365_H0375:242b-29: te dga' ba'i dbye pa la sogs pa yis de
K12D0365_H0375:243a-0: // ltar ro // dang por yang ni mi rnams kun gyis mig gis bltas @243a *//
K12D0365_H0375:243a-1: pa 'di yis 'dod chags 'khrugs pa dga' ba ste //
K12D0365_H0375:243a-2: phyi nas gang ba rang gi lus la rab tu
K12D0365_H0375:243a-3: 'dus pa mchog tu dga' ba nyid du 'gyur ba'o
K12D0365_H0375:243a-4: // 'bar ba yang dag rol pas rdo rje las ni padmar thig le 'dzag par dga' ba'o //
K12D0365_H0375:243a-5: aodda rdo rje las ni thig le gsum gyi mtha' ru bde ba 'gyur byed lhan cig skyes dga'o //
K12D0365_H0375:243a-6: 'dod dang dga' dang g-yo ba dang ni mi 'gyur
K12D0365_H0375:243a-7: ba ste bzhi rnams kyis ni de yi sbyor ba
K12D0365_H0375:243a-8: gcig / gang ba nus pa dang ni skye ba
K12D0365_H0375:243a-9: nges par yin te mchog tu dga' ba nyid rnams
K12D0365_H0375:243a-10: gcig / gnyis pa'o // 'bar ba dang ni thig
K12D0365_H0375:243a-11: le dag dang yur ba dang ste khyad par dga'
K12D0365_H0375:243a-13: aodda dang ni sgra tsam nyid de gnyid dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid rnams bzhi pa'o //
K12D0365_H0375:243a-14: sems kyis bsam par bya ba ma ste rig par
K12D0365_H0375:243a-15: bya zhing 'khyud pa yis ni sring mor 'gyur ba'o
K12D0365_H0375:243a-16: // rdo rje rab tu zhugs pa bu mor brjod
K12D0365_H0375:243a-17: de byed bcas shin tu bde ba de bzhin tsha
K12D0365_H0375:243a-18: // mo'o // thig le ltung ba chung mar 'gyur
K12D0365_H0375:243a-19: te chags bral gzhan gyi rigs su gyur pa'i rnal
K12D0365_H0375:243a-21: de ltar rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug ni sa dang
K12D0365_H0375:243a-22: chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' chad pa'i
K12D0365_H0375:243a-23: dngos // chu skyes su ni rdo rje rab zhugs
K12D0365_H0375:243a-24: pa dang mer ni rlung dang thig le ma lhung
K12D0365_H0375:243a-25: dngos // rim pa ste // de ltar rnal 'byor
K12D0365_H0375:243a-26: gsum gyi rab tu gsal bar nges par sku dang
K12D0365_H0375:243a-27: gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12D0365_H0375:243b-0: chags dang chags bral mtha' dang sngon du @243b bde
K12D0365_H0375:243b-1: ba dam pa'i gter ni sbyor bas go cha bzhi
K12D0365_H0375:243b-2: pa'o // phyag rgya rnams la yum gyi mchog gyur
K12D0365_H0375:243b-3: rnam pa bcu po de ni dpal ldan bla ma'i
K12D0365_H0375:243b-4: pa'o // zhal 'di'o // rnam pa bdun dang rnam
K12D0365_H0375:243b-5: pa gsum ste bcu po 'di ni 'jig rten kun
K12D0365_H0375:243b-7: de ltar de bzhin yang bzhi pa zhes gsungs pas so //
K12D0365_H0375:243b-9: gsum pa shes rab ye shes ma yin te /
K12D0365_H0375:243b-10: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang bzhi pa zhes smras pa'i phyir dang /
K12D0365_H0375:243b-11: de bzhin yang zhes gsungs pas so //
K12D0365_H0375:243b-12: 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K12D0365_H0375:243b-13: gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nu mar reg pa
K12D0365_H0375:243b-14: nyid dang gzhan yang bdud rtsi myong dang 'khyud pa'o
K12D0365_H0375:243b-15: // shes rab dang ni 'dus pas byang chub sems
K12D0365_H0375:243b-16: nyid zhu ba skad cig ma bzhir bdud rtsir gyur
K12D0365_H0375:243b-17: // pa gang // de rnams thams cad 'jig rten
K12D0365_H0375:243b-18: pa yi lam gyi rgyu ru snying rje mchog gis
K12D0365_H0375:243b-20: gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das dbang ni rgyal ba'i
K12D0365_H0375:243b-21: bdag po dam pa'i phyag rgya bzang dang rjes 'dus
K12D0365_H0375:243b-22: pa // las kyi phyag rgya dri ma dang bcas
K12D0365_H0375:243b-23: sems g-yang byed de ye shes phyag rgya rnam par
K12D0365_H0375:243b-24: pa // rtog yin pas // yang dag spangs te
K12D0365_H0375:243b-25: rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur ni rgyal mchog skyed byed
K12D0365_H0375:243b-26: phyag rgya bzang po sgom pa ni //
K12D0365_H0375:243b-27: gos pa med cing mi 'gyur mun 'joms kun la
K12D0365_H0375:243b-28: khyab pa mkha' mtshungs rnal 'byor ma yi go bya
K12D0365_H0375:243b-29: ba // lus la gnas pa'i ye shes gzi brjid
K12D0365_H0375:243b-30: srid pa'i dri ma 'joms pa dus kyi 'khor los
K12D0365_H0375:244a-1: kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid las skyes
K12D0365_H0375:244a-2: pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bur nges
K12D0365_H0375:244a-3: // ma lus rgyal sras rnams dang sangs rgyas rnams
K12D0365_H0375:244a-4: kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bsten
K12D0365_H0375:244a-5: // byas na // ye shes snang ba de nyid
K12D0365_H0375:244a-6: rab tu shar bas bdud dpung yul dang bcas pa
K12D0365_H0375:244a-8: chags pa la sogs rnams kyis rnal 'byor ba rnams
K12D0365_H0375:244a-9: lus la lo gcig sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar
K12D0365_H0375:244a-10: byed // shes rab ye shes zhes pa sems kyi
K12D0365_H0375:244a-11: snang ba nyid de yang rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur
K12D0365_H0375:244a-12: byed // ba'o // dbang 'dir zhugs pa gang zhig
K12D0365_H0375:244a-13: dri ma med pa'i ri bong can mtshungs me long
K12D0365_H0375:244a-15: de nas bde ba 'dzag pa med pa lhan cig
K12D0365_H0375:244a-16: skyes pa 'gyur med bzhi pa mya ngan 'das par
K12D0365_H0375:244a-17: reg / des na sangs rgyas zhal ni gang gi
K12D0365_H0375:244a-18: thugs dang zhal la gnas pa de nyid dpal ldan
K12D0365_H0375:244a-19: reg / bla ma'o // nam mkhar chags pa'i sems
K12D0365_H0375:244a-20: kyis mig mi 'dzum pa dang ni rdo rje'i lam
K12D0365_H0375:244a-21: du rab tu zhugs rnams kyis //
K12D0365_H0375:244a-22: stong pa las ni du pa smig rgyu rab tu
K12D0365_H0375:244a-23: gsal ba dri med srin bu me khyer mar me
K12D0365_H0375:244a-24: dang // 'bar dang nyi ma zla ba rdo rje
K12D0365_H0375:244a-25: rnams kyang gzhan yang mchog gi cha dang thig le
K12D0365_H0375:244a-26: dang // nyid rnams so // de yi dbus su
K12D0365_H0375:244a-27: sangs rgyas sku ni yul dang rnam par bral ba
K12D0365_H0375:244a-28: longs spyod rdzogs sku du ma'o //
K12D0365_H0375:244a-29: chu 'dzin bral ba'i mkha' la snang ba rnal 'byor
K12D0365_H0375:244b-0: rtse @244b gcig gnas pa'i lta bas blta bar bya
K12D0365_H0375:244b-1: ba ni // ji srid nges par ri mo nag
K12D0365_H0375:244b-2: po dri med 'od zer 'phro ba mthong ba dus
K12D0365_H0375:244b-4: der ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sku ni chu nang
K12D0365_H0375:244b-5: nyi ma bzhin du rnyog pa med pa sna tshogs
K12D0365_H0375:244b-6: mdog / yul dang rnam par bral ba'i rnam pa'i
K12D0365_H0375:244b-7: rnam pa ma lus rang gi sems te gzhan gyi
K12D0365_H0375:244b-9: sku mthong gyur nas nyin zhag so so'i dus su
K12D0365_H0375:244b-10: srog gi rlung nyid rab tu dgag par byas pa
K12D0365_H0375:244b-11: dang // brtul zhugs can rnams lam gyi sems ni
K12D0365_H0375:244b-12: zla ba drug gis reg bya bral nas bde mnyam
K12D0365_H0375:244b-13: dang // 'gyur ba'o // ji srid nges par rang
K12D0365_H0375:244b-14: gi lus la 'od zer 'khor los yongs su 'khor
K12D0365_H0375:244b-15: bar byed pa mthong ba'i bar //
K12D0365_H0375:244b-16: chags dang chags bral mtha' dang dang por song ba'i
K12D0365_H0375:244b-17: skad cig ma nas khyab bdag dbugs kyi grangs 'phel
K12D0365_H0375:244b-18: lo // mtha' dag 'bar ba'i dbus kyang khyad par
K12D0365_H0375:244b-19: dga' dang lhan cig skyes dang ye shes dang ni
K12D0365_H0375:244b-20: lo // rnam shes dang // gnyid dang brgyal ba'i
K12D0365_H0375:244b-21: dbus su gnas pa'i rdo rje padma dag gis gnyis
K12D0365_H0375:244b-22: sbyor bde ba gang yin pa //
K12D0365_H0375:244b-23: de yis 'phel bar rab tu bya ba bla ma'i
K12D0365_H0375:244b-24: nges pa'i stobs kyis 'di nyid 'phel bar the tshom
K12D0365_H0375:244b-25: med // bdud dang nyon mongs 'joms shing rgyal ba'i
K12D0365_H0375:244b-26: bdag po la gnas rnal 'byor pa yis lo gcig
K12D0365_H0375:244b-27: med // sbyor ba yis // sa yi rnam par
K12D0365_H0375:244b-28: snang yang sra ba min dang chu yi gzugs su
K12D0365_H0375:244b-29: snang yang chu min gsher ba med pa'i phyir //
K12D0365_H0375:245a-0: me yi rnam par snang yang me min rlung @245a *//
K12D0365_H0375:245a-1: gi gzugs su snang yang g-yo ba med pas rlung ma yin //
K12D0365_H0375:245a-2: stong ba'i rnam pa yin yang mthong ste dkar dang
K12D0365_H0375:245a-3: sngo ba la sogs mthong yang sna tshogs kha dog
K12D0365_H0375:245a-4: min // rnam pa kun ldan yin yang mi mthong
K12D0365_H0375:245a-5: rang sems dri ma nyon mongs dang ni bdud kyi
K12D0365_H0375:245a-6: min // mthu stobs kyis // sgra tsam thig la
K12D0365_H0375:245a-7: cha dang ye shes rnams ni bdud rtsi gnas su
K12D0365_H0375:245a-8: 'gro dang lcags sgrog bcings pa'i rtsa //
K12D0365_H0375:245a-9: srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams nas rdo rje padmar bcas dang padma rdo rje ldan pa yis //
K12D0365_H0375:245a-10: dbus su rlung dag 'gro dang 'jug pa yang dag 'dus pa yul can med par 'gyur ba dang //
K12D0365_H0375:245a-11: du ba la sogs mtshan ma rnams ni gang zhig
K12D0365_H0375:245a-12: gzungs dang 'di rnams 'dzin pa thams cad gsang ba
K12D0365_H0375:245a-13: chen po'o // dbus su srog gzhug pa ni nyi
K12D0365_H0375:245a-14: ma dang bcas zla bar gyur pa gams dang g-yon
K12D0365_H0375:245a-16: phyag rgya dang ni sbyor ba'i sems kyis mchog tu
K12D0365_H0375:245a-17: bde gyur pa dang rdo rje yang dag sad pa
K12D0365_H0375:245a-18: dang // bde ba dam pa'i don du padmar rdo
K12D0365_H0375:245a-19: rje bskyod dam rang gi lag pa'i padmas gsor ba
K12D0365_H0375:245a-20: dang // yis // sa bon ma btang bde ba
K12D0365_H0375:245a-21: de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dpal ldan
K12D0365_H0375:245a-23: sa ni chu la 'jug 'gyur chu yang me la
K12D0365_H0375:245a-24: de bzhin me ni rlung la 'jug par 'gyur ba'o
K12D0365_H0375:245a-25: // rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa mtshan
K12D0365_H0375:245a-26: ma rnam pa bcur 'gyur mtshan ma rnam pa kun
K12D0365_H0375:245a-27: // ldan du // rnam pa kun ldan mi 'gyur
K12D0365_H0375:245b-0: bde ba dam pa @245b gzhom du med pa ye
K12D0365_H0375:245b-2: mi yi bdag po ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul
K12D0365_H0375:245b-3: dngos grub 'gyur ro skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba
K12D0365_H0375:245b-4: 'dir // 'dod pas sprul pa'i sku ru nges par
K12D0365_H0375:245b-5: 'gyur te gang ba rdzogs pa gsung du rab tu
K12D0365_H0375:245b-7: te aoddam las ni mchog tu bde bar mdzad pa'i
K12D0365_H0375:245b-9: dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga'
K12D0365_H0375:245b-10: khyad par dga' dang bcas pa dag gi rim pa
K12D0365_H0375:245b-11: yis // gsung dang thugs te lhan cig skyes pa'i
K12D0365_H0375:245b-12: dga' ba sogs las ye shes rdo rje la sogs
K12D0365_H0375:245b-13: yis // 'byung bar byed // g-yo ba nges par
K12D0365_H0375:245b-14: chos kyi sku ste srid gsum phyag byas pa dang
K12D0365_H0375:245b-16: gnyid ni nges par chos kyi thugs te turya de
K12D0365_H0375:245b-17: yi ye shes nyid yin srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms
K12D0365_H0375:245b-18: // yi ge nges par dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs
K12D0365_H0375:245b-19: dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le sgra tsam rim
K12D0365_H0375:245b-20: // pa yis // gsung dang thugs dang ye shes
K12D0365_H0375:245b-21: rdo rje srid pa rnam gsum la gnas dag pa'i
K12D0365_H0375:245b-23: sad dang rmi lam rang bzhin dag dang gzhan yang
K12D0365_H0375:245b-24: de bzhin gnyid log pa dang tu rya'i rang bzhin
K12D0365_H0375:245b-25: rnams // lus gnas pa dang dbugs nyid thim pa
K12D0365_H0375:245b-26: rnam par rgyu dang yul las bskyod pa med pa'i
K12D0365_H0375:245b-27: sems thim pa; ;ye shes gnas kyang bud mad dang
K12D0365_H0375:245b-28: ni rab 'dus pa las byang chub sems zhu gyur
K12D0365_H0375:246a-0: sprul pa la sogs rim pas thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhi ru nges par rab tu @246a *//
K12D0365_H0375:246a-2: de ltar sems ni rnam pa bzhi rnams srid pa
K12D0365_H0375:246a-3: rnam gsum gyur pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i
K12D0365_H0375:246a-4: dbus // khyab byed bde mnyam 'bras ster thar pa'i
K12D0365_H0375:246a-5: rgyu ru rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bsrung bar
K12D0365_H0375:246a-6: dbus // bya ba ni // rnal 'byor rnams la
K12D0365_H0375:246a-7: mchog gi bde ba bskyed par sa bon thig le
K12D0365_H0375:246a-8: btang na thar par ga la 'gyur //
K12D0365_H0375:246a-9: de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba skad cig ma 'di
K12D0365_H0375:246a-10: brtul zhugs can rnams kyis ni rgyun du spang bar
K12D0365_H0375:246a-11: bya // dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshigs su bcad
K12D0365_H0375:246a-12: pa sum cu lhag pa'i stong phrag gcig pa las
K12D0365_H0375:246a-13: mdor bsdus pa dbang gi rab tu byed pa rdzogs
K12D0365_H0375:246a-14: bya // so //// rgya gar gyi pandi ta mkhas pa chen po sa manta shr'i dang /
